title: Internet Routing
body: Pingtest and other trace-route results have show my mate's internet completely intermittent in terms of DC (only with LoL open), but when he closes league altogether or when he reconnects (sometimes) it'll clear up. Otherwise outside of this game his internet is very consistent. This leads me to believe it's routing for the game servers. Is there anything on Riot's end that can throw some light on this?

replies.body: Anything short of a red appearing in here and telling you, there's not much you can find out. You can ask a bunch of other people, and they'll tell you they're working perfectly fine, so it's not common thing.
